x-sap-shortText: API for role based permission, such as access list of available roles.

x-servers.description: OData APIs for the SuccessFactors Data Centers

info.title: Role Based Permissions
info.description:
API for role based permission, such as access list of available roles, list of rules for a given role or list of rules across all roles and grant a role to a user.

 You can find your company's API server in [List of API Servers in SAP SuccessFactors.](https://help.sap.com/viewer/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/LATEST/en-US/af2b8d5437494b12be88fe374eba75b6.html)

externalDocs.description: Role Based Permissions on SAP Help Portal

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific
